"My fighter's not in good shape."
"Whoa! She's running like a dog!"
"And I just went in for maintenance!"
"哨戒をはじめますよー！"
"哨戒しちゃいますよー！"

"Argh! Somebody help!"
"Eek! It's not safe here!"
"Somebody, anybody, help!"
"はわっ、わわわっ！　だ、誰かー！"
"あぶっ、危ないっ！こんなの危ないですよー！"
"だ、誰かー！誰か助けてくださいー！"
"Running around is fun and all, but how about some help?"
"This is beyond a joke! Somebody help!"
"Things are getting out of hand! Somebody help me!"

"す、すごいことになってきてる？助けて！　王子様ー！"
